comments.author: Anhim.3156
comments.body:
So I’ve been developing a website to track skill changes, and this one is… amusing. I’m not sure if it’s suppose to happen.

On October 8th 2016, the skill changed from:


 "type": "Profession",
    "weapon_type": "None",
    "professions": [
        "Warrior",
        "Necromancer"
    ],
    "slot": "Profession_2",
to:

 "type": "Bundle",
    "weapon_type": "None",
    "professions": [
        "Warrior",
        "Necromancer"
    ],
    "slot": "Weapon_4",

Then on the 9th, it changed from:


"type": "Bundle",
    "weapon_type": "None",
    "professions": [
        "Warrior",
        "Necromancer"
    ],
    "slot": "Weapon_4",

to:


"type": "Profession",
    "weapon_type": "None",
    "professions": [
        "Warrior",
        "Necromancer"
    ],
    "slot": "Profession_2",

And today on the 10th, it made the same change as it did on the 8th… I’ve only been tracking this for 3 days, but this seems really… odd.
